About the Gluttonous Bear

27 Mar 2017

This website is dedicated to my eternal love and second most favorite leisure time activity, which is cooking. (Number one would be eating, as anyone could tell you). The recipes found here are part of a wide collection of food I cook on a regular basis, many are influenced by people I have met throughout my life. If you are among the people I have been lucky to meet, chances are one of your household dishes will end up in the Hall of Fame, aka the Guest Section of this site. Oh, and you will not find any baking here. I don't like baking. I'm not good at baking.I read somewhere, that baking is a science, and cooking is an art. And while I'm totally into computer science and astronomy, baking can go fuck off.
